a.title: Sevier School District and Central Utah Public Health Department officials discuss the coronavirus

div.div: March 13, 2020 /Coronavirus (COVID-19) related news and sports stories, Featured News, Local News
div.h1: Sevier School District and Central Utah Public Health Department officials discuss the coronavirus

div.data-a2a-title: Sevier School District and Central Utah Public Health Department officials discuss the coronavirus

div.p: Sevier School District Superintendent Cade Douglas along with Nate Selin and Alicia Beckstead from the Central Utah Public Health Department joined Robert Lovell and Porter Huntsman on KSVC’s Morning Talk Friday to discuss the effect COVID-19 is having on local schools.
They also discussed precautions individuals should take to prevent the spread and what steps to take going forward.
You can listen to the full interview below and it can be downloaded here.
div.div: Tags: Alicia Beckstead/Cade Douglas/Central Utah Public Health Department/Coronavirus/COVID-19/Nate Selin/Sevier School District
